textContent:
These are passive spells that empower other spells and enable certain playstyles.

Master Necromancer: You are now able to summon extra minions equal to the number of points invested in this ability. 10 points total.
title: Spell skills
textContentHtml:
These are passive spells that empower other spells and enable certain playstyles.


Master Necromancer: You are now able to summon extra minions equal to the number of points invested in this ability. 10 points total.
